meanings.sent1: The drapey curtains swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: Her drapey dress flowed elegantly as she walked.
meanings.sent3: The drapey tablecloth decided to take a nap on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The drapey vines cascaded down the old stone wall.
meanings.sent5: The drapey fabric danced like a graceful ghost in the moonlight.

meanings.definition: Having a tendency to hang or fall in a loose or flowing way
meanings.sent1: The drapey scarf kept her warm on the chilly evening.
meanings.sent2: The drapey branches of the willow tree swayed in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The drapey hair of the clown made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her drapey necklace added a touch of elegance to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The drapey fabric of the hammock cradled him like a baby.
